title: Baldur's Gate 3 speedrun brought under 5 minutes thanks to 'Shadowboxing,' a trick where you kill Shadowheart and stuff her in a box to skip Act 2

title: 60 hours in as Baldur's Gate 3's nasty Dark Urge and I'm kicking myself for missing a load-bearing early cutscene with unique dialogue for every race and class
description: It only triggers if you rest on the starting beach before recruiting too many companions.

title: SAG-AFTRA is holding a vote to potentially strike against major videogame publishers
description: With approval from the union's national board, it's now up to the members to decide.

title: Man up all night playing Starfield saves his family from an apartment fire
description: I do believe this is one of those "Epic Gamer Moments" we've heard so much about.

title: Japanese PC gaming saw another year of explosive growth
description: The unexpected trend continues upward with no end in sight.

title: Final Fantasy 16 is officially coming to PC
description: It's getting two DLC, to boot.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 is so ridiculously detailed I'm studying fantasy languages just to read its signs—and it's paying off
description: I am the dictionary definition of a nerd.

description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Bethesda hired a noted modder to help with Starfield's clutter and lighting
description: "I can now concede to the community that I am a Starfield developer."

title: PSA: Shut down Armored Core 6 before putting your PC to sleep or risk your saves
description: FromSoftware has confirmed it's looking into a fix for a save game bug.

title: Valve banned 90,000 smurf accounts from Dota 2—then got the main accounts too
description: Posing as a newbie has consequences, says Valve.
